#summary Tower alert and sanctuary overview.

A Power Point presentation of this tab is available here: http://koc-power-bot.googlecode.com/files/Tower%20show.ppsx

A free copy of MS Power Point viewer is available here: http://www.microsoft.com/download/en/details.aspx?id=6

*Tower Functions*
  # Audio Alert = ON / Audio Alert = OFF
    Toggles whether a signal should chime when a attack is incoming or not.
*Sanctuary*
  # Defend = OFF / Defend = ON
    Quick access buttons to toggle whether your troops should defend when attacked or hide in sanctuary to lessen your losses. One button for each City. Reinforcing troops always defend.

 # Automatically post incoming attacks to alliance chat.
    Post a message in alliance  chat when you are under attack and the following options are set:
    * Message Prefix:
      Here you can configure the title row of your automated post.
    * Alert on scouting:
      Check this if you want the bot to post a alert when you are being scouted.
    * Alert on wild attack:
      Check this if you want the bot to post a alert when your wilds are being attacked.
    * Minimum # of troops:
      Minimum number of incoming troops for a alert to be posted. If the attack contains fewer troops then what is entered here no alert will be sent. This limit affects all kinds of attacks.



Here are some cool alert sound files. Copy the URL into the 'Sound file:' box to try them:
